title: Get Client Approval on Ad Copy
description: A copywriter has finished writing ad copy and needs to get approval from the client before it goes live.

tasks.description: Place the ad copy into a shared document.
tasks.expected_outcome: The copy is in a format that is easy for the client to review.

tasks.description: Share the document with the client and request their feedback.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an email to the client with a link to the document.

tasks.description: Once feedback is received, make any necessary revisions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the copy based on the client's feedback.
